summary: Allows XPath searches to be performed on XML files
name: XPath-Search
description:
-Binds an input command for XML files to launch a search prompt.
-Start typing your XPath with the aid of context-sensitive tab completion, then hit enter to see the results pop up in a new window. 
-Jump to the line of a result by hitting enter in the results window
-Also displays XML validation errors in the results window, and allows you to jump to the problematic line easily.

For more information and a demo video visit http://www.actionshrimp.com/2011/04/vim-xpath-plugin/

Also see github: https://github.com/actionshrimp/vim-xpath
install_details:
Requires:
-Python support enabled on vim (look for +python under :version)
-lxml library installed for Python (ideally 2.7 or higher)

Download the xpath.vba vimball and source it to install (see :help vimball for more information). Then navigate to the doc directory and run :helptags to install the help file.

versions.release_notes: Updated to handle unnamed buffers and to search on the last searched buffer if the current window is the results window.
Fixed minor bugs and encoding issues.
